# Topic and Workflow Proposal

## Topic
How does land use correlate with local bee diversity in Oregon?


## Folder structure

- /bibliography
  - /bibliography/references.bib
    - bibtex file of references
  - /bibliography/annotated_bib.Rmd
    - annotated bibliography

- /data
  - /data/cleaned_data
    - For cleaned dataset
  - /data/raw_data
    - For raw data files

- /analysis
  - For data analysis and data cleaning files

- /paper
  - For the final paper
